Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Ease Life Skill and Alexa, you can now access your cameras using Alexa with your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV, Second Generations of The Fire TV Stick, Fire TV Edition smart TVs or Fire Tablets(Gen7 and above).

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Connect your camera to Ease Life App (you can download it from App Store and Google Play)
2. Make sure that your camera is online and works properly
3. Search for Ease Life Skill in your Alexa App
4. Click the "Enable Skill" button to link your camera's account with Alexa account and discover your camera

Now enjoy and play your camera with voice control, like:
- "Alexa, turn on the room"
- "Alexa, show the room"
- "Alexa, turn off the room"

Compatible Amazon Alexa Device:
* Echo Show
* Echo Spot
* Fire Tablets Generation 7th and above
* All generations of Fire TV
* Second generations of Fire TV stick
* Fire TV Edition smart TVs

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@visioninsight.com.
